CustomField.description: Number of days corresponding to the selected Payment Terms
CustomField.formula: CASE (TEXT( Payment_Terms__c ), '25 Days Net',25, '30 Days Net',30, '40 Days Net',40, '45 Days Net',45, '50 Days Net',50, '52 Days Net',52, '59 Days Net',59, '60 Days Net',60, '65 Days Net',65, '70 Days Net',70, '75 Days Net',75, '90 Days Net',90, 0)
CustomField.label: Payment Terms Days
